title: I played some video games
desc: and I had my first experience of 'fun' with technology.

title: I got hooked on Mythbusters.
desc: and to this day I honestly believe nothing has done more to interest me in science and technology than Jamie and Adam hurting themselves.

title: I played with light
desc: and still can't believe how mystical it is.

title: I modded some Xbox's
desc: so that I could play games for free. Oh, and use LED's. Tons of LED's.

title: I joined an indie band
desc: But not really. I just love this pic.

title: I became a zombie
desc: I'd been waiting for this day.

title: I jumped off something
desc: and luckily made it back safely.

title: I graduated from College
desc: with a degree in Physics.  I was really into science.

title: I joined the craziness at MakerBot
desc: And helped push 3 hardware products out into the world.

title: I started at NYU ITP
desc: and started playing with the web.
